scripts.packager_mac_intel: electron-packager ./ zoomsdkapp --platform=darwin --arch=x64 --out ./OutApp --electron-version=11.0.1 --overwrite --icon=./app.icns&& yes|cp -R  -H ../lib ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-x64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Resources/ && rm -rf ../sdk/win32 && rm -rf ../sdk/win64 && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-x64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Resources/ &&yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/Plugins ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-x64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/ && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/Resources ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-x64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/&& yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/ZoomSDK/* ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-x64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Frameworks && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/libprotobuf-lite.14.dylib ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-x64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Frameworks && yes|cp -R  -H ../node_modules ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-x64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Resources/
scripts.packager_mac_arm: electron-packager ./ zoomsdkapp --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 --out ./OutApp --electron-version=11.0.1 --overwrite --icon=./app.icns && yes|cp -R  -H ../lib ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-arm64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Resources/ && rm -rf ../sdk/win32 && rm -rf ../sdk/win64 && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-arm64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Resources/ && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/Plugins ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-arm64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/ && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/Resources ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-arm64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/ && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/ZoomSDK/* ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-arm64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Frameworks && yes|cp -R  -H ../sdk/mac/libprotobuf-lite.14.dylib ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-arm64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Frameworks && yes|cp -R  -H ../node_modules  ./OutApp/zoomsdkapp-darwin-arm64/zoomsdkapp.app/Contents/Resources
